name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC 2
description: 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC 2' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪MUSIC 2) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on September 5th, 2013. It is the eighth entry to be made for the main series, and the second installment of the 'MUSIC' spin-off series: focusing more on rhythm-based gameplay, than a visual novel experience. There are, however, segments that feature mini scenarios in-between sessions.
